data.name: Boost HP
data.description: Add xHP at the start of the fight and for the duration of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Fire
data.description: Add x% fire damage at the start of the fight and for the duration of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Water
data.description: Add x% water damage at the start of the fight and for the duration of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Air
data.description: Add x% air damage at the start of the fight and for the duration of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Earth
data.description: Add x% earth damage at the start of the fight and for the duration of the fight.

data.name: Restore
data.description: Restores xHP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.

data.name: Healing
data.description: Every 3 played turns, restores x% of HP at the start of the turn.

data.name: Antipoison
data.description: At the beginning of the turn, if the character has at least one poison on him, removes x poison damage.

data.name: Poison
data.description: At the start of his first turn, apply a poison of x on one of your opponents. Loses xHP per turn, damage cannot be dodged.

data.name: Lifesteal
data.description: Restores x% of the total attack of all elements in HP after a critical strike.

data.name: Reconstitution
data.description: At the beginning of the turn x, regains all HP.

data.name: Burn
data.description: On your first turn, apply a burn effect of x% of your attack of all elements. The damage is applied each turn and decreases by 10% each time. It is impossible to block.

data.name: Boost Resistance Air
data.description: Gives x% air resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Boost Resistance Water
data.description: Gives x% water resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Boost Resistance Earth
data.description: Gives x% earth resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Boost Resistance Fire
data.description: Gives x% fire resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Heal
data.description: Heal xHP when the item is used.

data.name: Teleport X
data.description: Teleports to position (X) x when the item is used.

data.name: Gold
data.description: Adds x gold in your inventory.

data.name: Teleport Y
data.description: Teleports to position (Y) x when the item is used.

data.name: Fire Attack
data.description: Adds x Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Water Attack
data.description: Adds x Water Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Air Attack
data.description: Adds x Air Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Earth Attack
data.description: Adds x Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Damage
data.description: Adds x% Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Fire Damage
data.description: Adds x% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Water Damage
data.description: Adds x% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Air Damage
data.description: Adds x% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Earth Damage
data.description: Adds x% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Fire Resistance
data.description: Adds x% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Water Resistance
data.description: Adds x% Water Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Air Resistance
data.description: Adds x% Air Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Earth Resistance
data.description: Adds x% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Critical Strike
data.description: Adds x% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Wisdom
data.description: Adds x Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.name: Prospecting
data.description: Adds x Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: Woodcutting
data.description: Reduces cooldown by x% when a character logs a tree.

data.name: Fishing
data.description: Reduces cooldown by x% when a character is fishing.

data.name: Mining
data.description: Reduces cooldown by x% when a character mines a resource.

data.name: Alchemy
data.description: Reduces cooldown by x% when a character harvest a plant.

data.name: Hit points
data.description: Adds x HP to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Inventory Space
data.description: Adds x to the maximum number of items in the inventory when equipped.

data.name: Haste
data.description: Adds x Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.
